label: A2B3_hR10_148_abc_f-001
title: Rhombohedral Cr$_{2}$S$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
(Jellinek, 1957) lists two structures for Cr$_{2}$S$_{3}$:  this rhombohedral structure, and a trigonal structure.  (Venkatraman, 1990) list this second structure as Cr$_{2}$S$_{3}$Cr.  It is likely that this structure is Jellinek's \href{current_web_home_dir/A5B6_hP22_163_abcf_i-001}{Cr$_{5}$S$_{6}$ structure}.  Jellinek notes that the two structures are identical except for the atoms on the (2a) Wyckoff site.  Presumably the Venkatraman structure is the Cr$_{5}$S$_{6}$ structure with the (2a) site partly filled. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
